ygData.subject: just wondering
ygData.msgSnippet: ok i have a question, when i first joined this list i was told not to just simply reply to a message, that i must first delete the thread.  Since then i have
ygData.messageBody:
ok i have a question, when i first joined this list i was told not to just
simply reply to a message, that i must first delete the thread. Since then
i have done as asked, but alot of ppl are replying to messages without
deleting the threads, while i understand the reason, NOW, for deleting the
thread,i do not understand why others don't delete as well? i am a little
miffed about this as it was not asked nicely of me, well maybe i took it
wrong, but just the same, if i have to delete the threads then why does
everyone else not have to. Also i was adding color to the message as i
thought it looked better and was told not to do that as well!! oh well i
was just wondering why i was told to do so and since then i have seen many
long messages by others. err ppl i am not slamming anyone i am just asking
a general question -- thanx for yer time -- anne *hugs*
